name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is a vintage-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot, known for its classic screen and nostalgic aura. With its vibrant red box, named RossoCorsa, and retro console buttons, it exudes a sense of timeless charm. Its arms and legs are built with precision by the Foundry, ensuring durability and stability. The classic screen adds a touch of nostalgia to its overall appearance, making it a perfect addition to the WebtrES club.
